explains: adj. 知道的，意识到的，了解的；审理的
wordGroup: be cognizant of 认识到…；知道…

sentences.en: We are cognizant of the problem.
sentences.cn: 我们认识到这个问题的存在。

sentences.en: In a grid environment, we have to be cognizant of the fact that people around the world may eventually tap into these applications.
sentences.cn: 在网格环境里，我们不得不认识到一个事实，即在世界各地的人们最终都会接触这些应用程序。

sentences.en: At the same time, I'm cognizant of the need for people to be insured.
sentences.cn: 同时，我认识到人们的需求并不确定。
